title: cant equip my emote
body: so i just bought my fresh new pengu *dab* emote and it wont let me save my emotes page, giving me error EMO3, help?

replies.body: Do me a favor and try adding exceptions for Leagues servers into your [**firewall settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3). That specific error is a good sign that your network couldn't get a solid connection with our servers, so that should do the trick. If not, try temporarily turning off your firewall to see if that helps.
